alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 2:02PM CST until January 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 degrees expected. * WHERE...Rio Grande Valley, Central Brewster county, and the Chisos Basin. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Presidio Valley
